pages.text: Binding stones are stones infused with $(l:exploration/gems)malachite$(), and have the property of "binding" themselves to a location.$(2br)These stones will act as a link the exact location you were standing, and can be used in rituals, but remember, all things age, so does the stone, hence it will be unsusable after many uses.

The stone can be bound to the location you are standing.
To do that, simply Right-click while holding it.
